artiste: David Burliuk, Vladimir Burliuk, Alexandra Exter, Vasilii Kamenskii
title: Futuristy. Pervyi zhurnal' russkikh' futuristov', no. 1-2 (Futurists: First Journal of the Russian Futurists, no. 1-2)
